0: Virtual reality (VR) technology has revolutionized the gaming industry, providing players with immersive experiences that were once unimaginable. By creating realistic 3D environments, VR allows users to feel as if they are truly part of the game world. This technology is not only transforming entertainment but also has applications in fields such as education and healthcare. With continuous advancements, VR is expected to become even more integrated into our daily lives.

(1) The history of virtual reality technology.
(2) The impact of VR on the gaming industry.
(3) The applications of VR beyond gaming.
(4) The future of virtual reality technology.
